title: North Carolina's Crystal Coast | Hotels, Beaches & Things To Do
description: The Southern Outer Banks is where you'll find North Carolina's Crystal Coast. Experience the people, places and things to do in this remarkable destination.
cleaned_text: The Crystal Coast - Southern Outer Banks® The Crystal Coast is an 85-mile stretch of [beaches](https://www.crystalcoastnc.org/things-to-do/beaches/) known as the Southern Outer Banks. The collection of beaches and towns offers a unique blend of history, family fun, water sports and natural areas. Explore our beaches and [activities sections](https://www.crystalcoastnc.org/things-to-do/) to find areas that appeal to you. Once you choose which areas you'll be visiting on your stay, browse [restaurants](https://www.crystalcoastnc.org/restaurants/), venues, [places to stay](https://www.crystalcoastnc.org/places-to-stay/) and more to [customize your vacation](https://www.crystalcoastnc.org/plan-your-vacation/).
